meanings.definition: The quality or state of being difficult or impossible to read or decipher.
meanings.sent1: The illegibility of the doctor's handwriting made it hard to understand the prescription.
meanings.sent2: The illegibility of the faded ink on the old document posed a challenge for historians.
meanings.sent3: The illegibility of the menu led to some comical misinterpretations by the customers.
meanings.sent4: The illegibility of the ancient runes added an air of mystery to the archaeological discovery.
meanings.sent5: The illegibility of the map caused the travelers to take a wrong turn into the forest.
